channel.title: General Dylan Fun Awesomeguy Etsy Creatures Awesometown on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Dylan Fun Awesomeguy Etsy Creatures Awesometown on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Monsters for you to buy and make your friend!
item.description: My brother has been making these awesome little monsters out of socks for a little while. They are pretty cool and quite cute. I recently noticed that his etsy site was somehow a bit incomplete - so i thought about what made some of the other creature makers creatures successful. I decided that key was the stories the awesome story about each character and monster really added a lot of personalization to the various creatures.
